snippet.title: SPIDER-MAN PUBLIC BETA | Smash Remix Mod Release
snippet.description:
This is a modded version of Smash-Remix that adds Spider-Man as a brand new character. This project is not affiliated with Smash Remix or the team behind it.
Spider-Man has his own character slot, along with a completely unique moveset based heavily on the MvC series (plus several unique moves exclusive to the mod).
Although the mod isn't fully complete, it's at a point where I'm satisifed with opening it to the public.
Thank you to the Smash Remix dev team and Discord server for help on the project, it wouldn't have been finished without them!
If you find any bugs or issues (that aren't listed on the github page), please contact me @UltIMa647 on Twitter.

Hop on Twitter: https://twitter.com/UltIMa647
I also stream: https://www.twitch.tv/ultima647

DOWNLOAD: https://github.com/UltIMa647/smashremix/releases/tag/1.5.0
(Use xdelta to patch a vanilla USA rom.)
